item.title: By: Helen Dean
item.dc:creator: Helen Dean
item.description: The pizza is delicious! The crust is thin and crispy, great sauce, and awesome cheese blend. And it makes a cute cheap date!
item.content:encoded: The pizza is delicious! The crust is thin and crispy, great sauce, and awesome cheese blend. And it makes a cute cheap date!

item.title: By: Eddie Stone
item.dc:creator: Eddie Stone
item.description: Vincent was one of the first restaurants I discovered upon moving to New York last summer, and it remains a favorite. Despite its sizable menu full of pastas, sandwiches, and pizzas, I almost always get the same thing – the Vincent pizza. It\'s made with Ricotta & Marinara sauces, spiced with oregano, and topped with eggplant, red onions, basil, Pecorino Romano & Mozzarella. It really is one of the best pizzas I\'ve ever had – and I eat a lot of pizza.
item.content:encoded: Vincent was one of the first restaurants I discovered upon moving to New York last summer, and it remains a favorite. Despite its sizable menu full of pastas, sandwiches, and pizzas, I almost always get the same thing – the Vincent pizza. It\’s made with Ricotta & Marinara sauces, spiced with oregano, and topped with eggplant, red onions, basil, Pecorino Romano & Mozzarella. It really is one of the best pizzas I\’ve ever had – and I eat a lot of pizza.
